description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Get ready for some kart racing! Gather up to 4 players for Grand Prix, Versus Racing, and Battle Mode.  Or play Time Trial and set up to 10 top times for 16 different tracks, and share your best times over XBox LIVE!
description.short: Get ready for some kart racing! Gather up to 4 players for Grand Prix, Versus Racing, and Battle Mode.  Or play Time Trial and set up to 10 top times for 16 different tracks, and share your best times over XBox LIVE!
